channel.title: Help with objects

item.title: Help with objects
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

I want a door to tele me to the other side when i click it
but how would i make it so once im on the other side and i click the same door it would tele me outside

example: castle wars spawn doors in rs

      |

in side | out side
|

so i want it to tele me inside when i click the out side door
and when i click the inside door it will tele me outside useing the same door

so far i got it to tele me inside

case 5244: if(objectX == 3670 && objectY == 3497) { teleportToX = 3670; teleportToY = 3497; heightLevel = 0; }

i just need it to tele me outside after i click it

i tried this but doesnt work

case 5244: if(objectX == 3670 && objectY == 3497) { teleportToX = 3671; teleportToY = 3497; heightLevel = 0; } else { if(objectX == 3670 && objectY == 3497) { teleportToX = 3671; teleportToY = 3497; heightLevel = 0; } } break;

/------------
| [] [] |
| |
| [] |
| [] [] |
------------/

ill give you this chocolate chip cookie if you help =P

Read full topic
